text: The Post of Manila was a US Army post, in Manila, (Luzon, the Philippines), at which several U.S. Army units were stationed. On 7 December 1941, these were * the Philippine Division's 31st Infantry Regiment * 288th Signal Company (Operations) * 808th MP Company ==See also== *Geography of the Philippines *Military History of the Philippines *Military History of the United States == Notes == Category:Military history of the Philippines Category:History of Manila
title: Post of Manila
